text: Dimaadua ga helekai di hai o Jehoiakim, di tama Josiah, di king o Judah,22.18 2 Kings 23.36—24.6; 2 Kronikel 36.5-7 “Tangada e dangidangi gi di made o maa ai be e helekai boloo, ‘Ii, au ga aloho, au ga aloho i dogu ihoo hagaaloho!’ Tangada e dangidangi gi mee ai boloo, ‘Dogu dagi, dogu king!’
